page.title: 18HOME LIFE 4 BISHOP THORNTON
page.content: Most children in our school have at least one pet. The favourite is a dog, second is a cat, third is keeping tropical fish. Other pets are ponies, goldfish, rabbits and cockateel birds. The favourite hobby of our children is horse riding, second is helping on the farm, third is making things. Other hobbies are B.M.X. cycle riding, reading, piano, brass and recorder playing, collecting postcards and stamps and playing with a computer. Bad habits are biting nails, sucking thumbs and picking noses. Favourite books are 2001 Space Odyssey A.C. Clarke. The Railway Children, E. Nesbit, The B.F.G. and Witches, Roald Dahl, The Secret Seven, Enid Blyton, Alice in Wonderland, Lewis Carol, The Incredible Journey, Sheila Burnford. Holidays, Ibiza, Scotland, Butlins holiday camp, France and Gt. Yarmouth.
